data.persona: I am gone from my native land. The humans have captured me and seven of my brothers, bound us in cages, and forced us to tour their strange country. Other humans come from all over, paying coin to look upon my brothers and I. I cannot stand the shame. I call to my brother to organize our escape.
data.description:
You are in the outlaws' jungle.
The jungle is lush and green, full of vegetation. Vines hang in the air, and the sound of wildlife echoes through the trees. Monkeys laugh, a tiger roars, an elephant trumpets.
A mountain lion and a hyena are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I hit the hyena so he will try to break my cage to attack me and free me while doing so
data.mid_motivation: I use the hyena to break out of my cage and then free my brothers.
data.long_motivation: I run away from the humans and find my way home

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal walking cane from old man

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal keys to other cages from human guard

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal map of jungle from human guard
